name: Notion Database Diagram Kit
description:
This a kit for diagramming Notion Database configurations.

If you are making systems and need to keep track of how things are connected this might come in handy for you.


This is primarily intended for use as a component library in Figjam hence the lack of dark mode version. Of course you can use this in Figma too. Figjam makes it easy to create connections between different database properties.


**Update May 20th

Added data field mappings for annotating designs
